abstract: Analytical reviews on the level of evidence presented in publications. This report specifically covers the following publications: pmid32643418, pmid32657967, pmid32648093, pmid32644979, pmid32647285, pmid32652001, pmid32639742, pmid32657473, pmid32652520, pmid32657483
